lead_paragraph: Protesters in a repressive nation focus on issues like land use and the governing party’s stranglehold on power.

headline.print_headline: ‘A Generation Is Protesting’ in Ethiopia, Cherished by the West for Its Stability
headline.main: ‘A Generation Is Protesting’ in Ethiopia, Long a U.S. Ally

snippet: Protesters in a repressive nation focus on issues like land use and the governing party’s stranglehold on power....
abstract: Growing antigoverment protests in Ethiopia have raised concerns that one of Africa's most stable nations and longtime Western ally will be consumed by conflict shaking much of region; government response to protests has been ruthless.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
